ScienceFictionMovies.title: Cloverfeild Paradox
ScienceFictionMovies.description: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.
ScienceFictionMovies.stars: Gugu Mbatha- Raw, David Oyelowo, Daniel Bruhl

ScienceFictionMovies.title: Extinction
ScienceFictionMovies.description: A father has a recurring dream of losing his family. His nightmare turns into reality when the planet is invaded by a force bent on destruction. Fighting for their lives, he comes to realize an unknown strength to keep them safe from harm.
ScienceFictionMovies.stars: Michael Pena, Lizzy Caplan, Amelia Crounch

ScienceFictionMovies.title: Fahrenheit 451
ScienceFictionMovies.description: In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman and begins to rebel against society.
ScienceFictionMovies.stars: Michael B. Jordan, Aaron Davis, Sofia Boutella

ScienceFictionMovies.title: Titan
ScienceFictionMovies.description: A military family takes part in a ground-breaking experiment of genetic evolution and space exploration.
ScienceFictionMovies.stars: Sam Worthington, Taylor Schilling, Tom Wilkinson
